pages.text: $(l)Days and Nights$() $(br2)Welcome to the new time cycle, where days are longer and nights are cozier. $(br2)Days now last 30 minutes and nights 20 minutes, giving you a full 50 minutes per day to conquer the world -- or take a well-deserved nap.

$(l)Keep Phantoms at Bay$() $(br2)Under the sky, you're safe from mobs, as they won't spawn out in the open. Except, of course, for those pesky phantoms. Make sure to sleep once in a while to keep them at bay, unless you enjoy midnight swooping.

$(l)Pass the Time$() $(br2)You can always sleep to pass the night. And if you'd rather daydream, make a hammock to swing away the afternoon like a tropical vacation. $(br2)Alternatively, the Ritual of Moonlight from Ars Nouveau can be used to skip the day entirely and bask in the soothing glow of night.
